Title: Keston pump with flying leads
Description: Supplied with flyng leads, this Keston pump moves heated water around a boiler, via the heat exchangers and into radiators or hot taps. The pump is normally located before the diverter valve in a combi boiler to allow circulation through a heating and hot water system.
category: Parts and Spares/Commercial and Industrial Boiler Parts/Potterton Commercial Boiler Parts/Potterton Commercial Boiler Parts.csv -> Keston pump with flying leads

Title: Potterton control box
Description: A Potterton control box for the now out of production Derwent Prestige and Compact Plus models. The boiler control panel usually features control knobs and a digital display for switching the boiler on and off, viewing fault info and setting modes.
category: Parts and Spares/Commercial and Industrial Boiler Parts/Potterton Commercial Boiler Parts/Potterton Commercial Boiler Parts.csv -> Potterton control box

Title: Potterton air vent
Description: This Potterton automatic air vent is suitable for use in Potterton Paramount commercial and industrial boilers. A central heating safety device, the air vent releases built up air. As water flows through the system, a float opens or closes the vent depending on the water level. When the system is full the float is pushed to the top, closing the vent until the water level drops.
category: Parts and Spares/Commercial and Industrial Boiler Parts/Potterton Commercial Boiler Parts/Potterton Commercial Boiler Parts.csv -> Potterton air vent

Title: Potterton igniter
Description: This Potterton 2V igniter is a suitable replacement part for a variety of Potterton Commercial boilers. A spark generator and spark electrode are part of a boiler's pilot assembly, used when generating a spark to ignite the pilot burner. This assembly is operated by an electronic control, usually via the user control panel but sometimes, particularly with older boilers, the pilot must be ignited manually.
category: Parts and Spares/Commercial and Industrial Boiler Parts/Potterton Commercial Boiler Parts/Potterton Commercial Boiler Parts.csv -> Potterton igniter

Title: Potterton fan
Description: A genuine Potterton spare, this fan is compatible with Eurocondense 2 90 - 250 and Eurocondense Plus 90 - 250 and 160 - 500 Commercial boilers. The fan introduces fresh air into a boiler's combustion chamber, ensuring that gas is burnt correctly and extracting burnt gas at the end of the combustion process. Your boiler's safety parameters ensure that no gas passes through to the main burner if the fan is not functioning correctly.
category: Parts and Spares/Commercial and Industrial Boiler Parts/Potterton Commercial Boiler Parts/Potterton Commercial Boiler Parts.csv -> Potterton fan

Title: Potterton Sirius Two BUS module (OCI345)
Description: Suitable for use with Sirius Two FS boilers, this Potterton bus communication module helps a heating system to accurately meet the complete heating requirements of a building. This module allows for simple two-way communication management between boilers installed in a cascade or between zone controllers and boilers. Title: Potterton Paramount gas valve 80kw
Description: A genuine Potterton part, this gas valve is suitable for Paramount boilers. The gas valve is employed in the distribution of gas. When gas is required in the burner the printed circuit board (PCB) sends a signal to the gas valve, which opens to allow gas to flow into the burner or the pilot assembly (depending on the model of the appliance).

Title: Potterton burner gasket flange
Description: This Potterton replacement flange burner gasket is compatible with a wide range of the brand's commercial boilers. O-rings, gaskets and washers are used in many different areas of the boiler to join parts to pipework. Among other sections, heat exchangers and gas valves require these parts to prevent gas and water leaks.

Title: Potterton 577564 auto syphon
Description: This Potterton 577564 auto siphon is compatible with Potterton Eurocondense and Paramount commercial boilers. A siphon is designed to collect the discharge caused by pressure and temperature fluctuations in primary heating/cooling systems.

Title: Potterton electronic card
Description: This Potterton PCB is compatible with the Robot Coupe CL50B. The control centre of a boiler, the printed circuit board (PCB) monitors and controls every process occurring throughout a system via switches, thermostats and sensors. It enforces safety measures too, shutting down boiler functions if internal readings indicate any fault such as high pressure or low water levels.
category: Parts and Spares/Commercial and Industrial Boiler Parts/Potterton Commercial Boiler Parts/Potterton Commercial Boiler Parts.csv -> Potterton electronic card

Title: Potterton UPML UPML 25-105 130 primary loop pump
Description: A genuine Potterton part, this primary loop pump kit is used in primary circuit water circulation.

Title: Potterton condensate collector
Description: This Potterton 80kW condensate collector is suitable for use in the brand's Paramount commercial and industrial boilers. The condensate trap holds discharge that accumulates in the primary heating or cooling system caused by changes in pressure and temperature. A discharge pipe connected to the condensate trap sends held water out of the property. This pipe is ordinarily made of plastic that can withstand the low levels of acid present due to CO2 from the combustion process dissolving in the water.
category: Parts and Spares/Commercial and Industrial Boiler Parts/Potterton Commercial Boiler Parts/Potterton Commercial Boiler Parts.csv -> Potterton condensate collector
